channel.title: Weekly Digests on Sam Feldstein
channel.description: Recent content in Weekly Digests on Sam Feldstein

item.title: Weekly Digest
item.description: New post(s) alert In case you missed them, I wrote two new posts this week: a short one about Talmudic wisdom in The Exorcist (the book, not the movie) and a longer one about shock and Lonesome Dove (the movie, not the book). (It's actually a miniseries but I really wanted to capitalize on that symmetry just now.) New publication(s) alert This week I have the pleasure of announcing that my short story "The Man Who Was a Boy Made of Memories" was just published on the Tales to Terrify podcast.

item.title: Weekly Digest
item.description: News My big update is that this website exists. I've been flirting with blogging for years now, but I've never committed to it. I've created and deleted several websites--mostly out of self-consciousness and an inability to decide how to spend my time--but this one looks like it's here to stay. I'm really happy with how it turned out. I've been slowly learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript over the last two years or so, first via The Odin Project and then MDN Web Docs.
